name: the quest to be god
description:
Play as Shagy as you venture through the land of the stoned on a quest to beome GOd!!!

use headphones for bedst experience

This game has

custom enemys

lotsa fun

around an hour of playtime

drugs

funny jokes

and more

Enjoy!

!!! IMPORTANT !!!

If you do NOT own a copy of or have RPG Maker VX Ace installed on your computer, you may get an error claiming that the RPG Maker RTP is required to run the game.

Please go to www.rpgmakerweb.com/downloads or click the link below and download the required Runtime Package. Be sure that the Runtime Package is for RPG Maker VX Ace!

If you DO own a copy of RPG Maker VX ACE and have it currently installed, you should be able to play this game no problem! If you somehow still get the RTP error, simply run a playtest on an existing game and close it. This should get the RTP all warmed up and make it so that you can now play the game!

The link to the RPG Maker's website is here:

RPG Maker RTP Downloads | RPG Maker | Make A Game! (rpgmakerweb.com)

Note: In order to play in fullscreen mode, press F1 on your keyboard, click "launch in fullscreen mode", then close and relaunch the game. Thank you!

(please do not pay for this game, I do not have a payment plan set up and do not plan to have it set up. thank you.)
